name: alarm_state
func:
msg.alarm_state = global.get('alarm_state') || 'inactive';

return msg;

name: save secrets in memory
get already loaded secret
export secret
set bearer
Input + sensor value = output
select other scenes

Has tasks
No tasks
read tasks
check alarm
Create message

set wake-up-period false

name: Tumbler Ended Message
Push Notification
data: {"title":"Tumbler done 👕","message":"Don't wait for your clothes to wrinkle!"}

name: Notification
data: {"title":"Washing Machine started 👕","message":"Has been started by a timer!"}

name: Welcome Message
set exiting=true
func:
global.set('exiting', true);

return msg;

name: set exiting=false
func: global.set('exiting', false);

name: Pause all media players
entityId: media_player.samsung_tv, media_player.everywhere, media_player.google_home, media_player.bathroom, media_player.home_hub, media_player.bedroom_speaker, media_player.loggia_speaker

name: Notify iPhone
data: {	   "message":"WestLink Apartment Door opened",	   "title":"Access Control Alert",	   "data": {	       push: {	           sound: "default",	           critical: 1,	           volume: 0	        }	   }	}

data: {	   "message":"WestLink Apartment Door opened",	   "title":"Access Control Alert",	   "data": {	       push: {	           sound: "default",	           critical: 1,	           volume: 0	        }	   }	}

name: Telegram Log
data: {"message":"Security Alert: Apartment Door opened while access control was enabled!"}

name: calculate total networth
convert to percentage
func:
msg.payload = parseFloat(msg.payload) * 100;
return msg;

name: calculate pmo
reset pmo
func:
msg.payload = 0;
return msg;

name: calculate craving
calculate mood
reset mood
calculate calories
reset calories
func:
msg.payload = 0;
return msg;

name: calculate mo
map health metrics to influx measurement
map workout metrics to influx measurement
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.data.workouts.map(workout =>
    ({
        measurement: "workout",
        fields: {
            ...(workout.humidity.qty && {workout_humidity_percentage: workout.humidity.qty}), //62
            ...(workout.flightsClimbed.qty && {workout_flightsClimbedCount_stairs: workout.flightsClimbed.qty}), //0
            ...(workout.swimCadence.qty && {workout_swimCadence_spm: workout.swimCadence.qty}), //0
            ...(workout.totalSwimmingStrokeCount.qty && {workout_totalSwimmingStrokeCount_strokes: workout.totalSwimmingStrokeCount.qty}), //0   
            ...(workout.intensity.qty && {workout_intensity_met: workout.intensity.qty}), //8.7823
            ...(workout.temperature.qty && {workout_temperature_degC: workout.temperature.qty}), //3.9
            ...(workout.avgHeartRate.qty && {workout_avgHeartRate_bpm: workout.avgHeartRate.qty}), //140.78
            ...(workout.stepCadence.qty && {workout_stepCadence_spm: workout.stepCadence.qty}), //1.449
            ...(workout.totalEnergy.qty && {workout_totalEnergy_kJ: workout.totalEnergy.qty}), //1723.616
            ...(workout.maxHeartRate.qty && {workout_maxHeartRate_bpm: workout.maxHeartRate.qty}), //170
            ...(workout.stepCount.qty && {workout_stepCount_steps: workout.stepCount.qty}), //3081
            ...(workout.distance.qty && {workout_distance_km: workout.distance.qty}), //0
            ...(workout.activeEnergy.qty && {workout_activeEnergy_kJ: workout.activeEnergy.qty}), //1471
            ...(workout.elevation.ascent && {workout_elevationAscent_m: workout.elevation.ascent}), //0
            ...(workout.elevation.descent && {workout_elevationDescent_m: workout.elevation.descent}), //0
            ...(workout.start && {workout_totalTime_min: Math.floor(((Math.abs(new Date(workout.end) - new Date(workout.start)))/1000)/60)}), //0            
        },
        tags:{
            workout_type: workout.name //Fitness Gaming
        },
        timestamp: Date.parse(workout.start) 
    }))
	.filter(e => Object.keys(e.fields).length) // only return entries with fields

return msg;

name: map 2. Säule
Get latest 2. Säule Total Value
query: SELECT distinct("total_value") FROM "CHF" WHERE ("entity_id" = 'vorsorge_2_saeule') GROUP BY * ORDER BY DESC LIMIT 1

name: Neon format
influx format
extract
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.csv;

return msg;

name: categorize
get balance
UBS format
Revolut format
Neon Correction File
template:
SKIP;SKIP;SKIP
Date;Amount;Description
2022-02-01;2247;Correction: SBB Wrongly booked rent as transport

name: calculate IBKR balance
add 1 exp
reset daily exp
func:
msg.newExpValue = 0;

return msg;

name: read existing and perform action
Action: Delete
func:
msg.action = "DELETE"
return msg;

name: Action: Done
func:
msg.action = "DONE"
return msg;

name: Action: Back Off
func:
msg.action = "BACK_OFF"
return msg;

name: Action: Add New
func:
msg.action = "ADD_NEW"
return msg;

name: influx format
calculate days since last emptied
Pause all media players
entityId: media_player.samsung_tv, media_player.everywhere, media_player.google_home, media_player.bathroom, media_player.home_hub, media_player.bedroom_speaker, media_player.loggia_speaker

name: 100kcal
func:
msg.payload = 100;
return msg;

name: 50kcal
func:
msg.payload = 50;
return msg;

name: Pause all media players
entityId: media_player.samsung_tv, media_player.everywhere, media_player.google_home, media_player.bathroom, media_player.home_hub, media_player.bedroom_speaker, media_player.loggia_speaker
